Docs.summary: Provides a hint to the common language runtime (CLR) indicating how likely a dependency is to be loaded. This class is used in a dependent assembly to indicate what hint should be used when the parent does not specify the attribute. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This attribute is used by the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) to generate native assembly images.
Apply the DefaultDependencyAttribute attribute to a dependent assembly to determine the preferred default binding.
A dependency that is likely to be loaded (<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.LoadHint>) will cause Ngen.exe to bind to that dependency. Using this hint allows Ngen.exe to generate code that will result in a reduced working set and improved throughput but at the cost of always loading the dependency when the parent assembly is loaded.
When you apply the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DependencyAttribute> attribute to an assembly with a value of <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.LoadHint>, the native image generation service consults the dependent assembly for its preferred default binding, which is specified by the DefaultDependencyAttribute attribute.
